column5: just wondering other than bass pro,who has the new deep diving x-raps   i was at bass pro about 1 month ago and they were sold out they only had 2 colours left,rainbow trout,perch,of course i bought them both,but i am looking for a few more colours has anyone been there lately to know if they are re-stocked...thanks
I do believe I saw them at Grimsby Tackle.  PHONE: 905-945-0399 FAX: 905-945-3817

Hey fishindevil.  I was down at Bass Pro last week and bought the deep diving x-raps in perch and silver, but I missed out on the rainbow trout colours. They must be restocking but selling fast each time!  I also picked up some of the new minnow raps - the detail on some of them is amazing plus some have red hooks and bill at the front - they look good and hope they catch me some fish next year or may be this weekend  Hope you find some more soon.  007
Have you checked Gagnon's yet ??  I haven't been in there since the re-build, but they used to carry a huge assortment of pickeral baits and may have what your looking for.
Walmart has them in London... probably 100+ in stock, 7 or 8 patterns for $8.56 I believe. -Brian
was @ BPS last night and they were stocked up on them
thanks guys,and lew im in gagnons all the time and they dont have them,i will check our wal-mart but i dont think they have them,i will go to bass pro i guess,thanks for all your help

I was at the Wal-Mart in Cobourg yesterday and they had piles of them on display.  I didn't really take notice which colours they had, but there was a lot of different ones.  Cobourg may be a shorter drive for you than BPS.
There are lots of them in the Walmart store in Chicoutimi Quebec too.
